titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 890 entitled "A bill for the relief of Matt Clawson." to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 9/26/1994--Introduced. Refers S. 890, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
